text.mine-lights.about.title: MineLights
text.mine-lights.about.support_intro: If this mod bringeth thee joy, think on upholding its becoming:
text.mine-lights.about.kofi: Buy me a drink on Ko-fi
text.mine-lights.about.description: MineLights is a Minecraft Fabric mod that bringeth RGB light-workings to the Minecraft Java Making.
option.mine-lights.enableMod.tooltip: Switcheth all light-workings from this mod.
option.mine-lights.autoStartServer: Start the Thegn by its own self
option.mine-lights.autoStartServer.toolt:
If onflowed, the mod will self-start the thegn
if it is not running. The thegn's EXE must be in the
'MineLights' folder inside thy .minecraft lands.
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.label: Anew the Gear List
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.toolt:
If thou pluggest in new gear while the game is running,
check this and keep to make it show in the list.
option.mine-lights.restart.label: Anew-start the Thegn
option.mine-lights.restart.tooltip:
If the thegn's work crashes or stops answering,
check this box and keep to anew-start it.
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.label: Anew-start the Thegn as High Reeve
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.tooltip:
Bruck this if sameworkings like Mystic Light are unworking.
Needs high reeve rights.
option.mine-lights.device.header: Onflow or off-flow sundry light-gear below:
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.label: Anew-onflow All Gear
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.toolti: Check this box to clear the list of all off-flowed gear.
option.mine-lights.enableSaturationBar.t:
Shows thy food's fullness on F9-F12.
Switches to thy breath-mark when underwater.
option.mine-lights.enableLocatorBar.tool: Shows the bearing of other players or waymarks on keys 1-0.
option.mine-lights.alwaysShowCompass.too:
If onflowed, the wayfinder's work will alway show the standard wayfinder
(showing to the world's beginning), even if thou hast none.
It will be over-ridden if thou takest up any wayfinder.
option.mine-lights.compassPriority.toolt: Settles which wayfinder to show if many kinds are in thy hoard.
option.mine-lights.highlightMovementKeys: Highlights WASD, Sprint, Sneak, and Leap keys.
option.mine-lights.enableBiomeEffects.to: Sets a groundwork key-board hue drawn from the land where thou standest.
option.mine-lights.dimmingMode.tooltip: Choose how world looks fade with light around thee.
option.mine-lights.enableInWaterEffect.t: Highlights fare keys with a blue hue when underwater.
option.mine-lights.force_update.label: Look for Newest Þénweard
option.mine-lights.force_update.tooltip: Drives a lookup with GitHub for the newest þénweard workfile and fetches it if needed.
minelights.status.downloading: Standing: Loadin... %d/%d megabyte (%d%%) Left time: %s Speed: %s MB/s
minelights.status.success: Standing: Download and beginning sped well!
